ai-mil7.6.9:1.1_0: “Are you able to take three things that should be cultivated?”
ai-mil7.6.9:1.2_0: “Great king, if a monk goes to an demonstrable,
ai-mil7.6.9:1.3_0: In the same way, anyone who enters the village should frequently reflect with wisdom as someone who has acted with wisdom as a debate, and celibacy.
ai-mil7.6.9:1.4_0: This is the first kind of learned person.
ai-mil7.6.9:2.1_0: Furthermore, there is a snake, a leader, and mixing.
ai-mil7.6.9:2.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant should conduct themselves badly.
ai-mil7.6.9:2.3_0: This is the second kind of deceiver.
ai-mil7.6.9:3.1_0: Furthermore, after seeing a human being, the sound of thought spreads to people:
ai-mil7.6.9:3.2_0: In the same way, if a cow being slaughtered on the side of the thought, they should plant think: ‘May I not think of this kindling, and circling me again and again.’
ai-mil7.6.9:3.4_0: The Buddha has instructed that promote is being devoted, when he is finished, the two classes of rebirth.
ai-mil7.6.9:4.1_0: ‘In the midst of the greedy mans,
ai-mil7.6.9:4.4_0: and getting late to lie down again.’”
ai-mil7.6.9:5.1_0: The ninth with wisdom in charge of building work.
